introduction.para: Restrict the type of data or the values that users enter into a cell.

listItem.para: Select the cell(s) you want to create a rule for
On the Settings tab, under Allow, select an option:
Whole Number - to restrict the column to accept only whole numbers
List - to pick data from the drop-down list.
Date - to restrict the cell to accept only date.
Time - to restrict the cell to accept only time.
Text Length - to restrict the length of the text.
Set the other required values, based on what you chose for Allow and Data.

content.para: Now, if the user tries to enter a value that is not valid, a pop-up appears with the message, “This value doesn’t match the data validation restrictions for this cell.”
